message.jmws.deletion_failure: Could not delete waypoint on the server
message.jmws.creation_failure:
Could not create waypoint on the server.
It is recommended to delete the waypoint and try again.
message.jmws.creation_group_failure:
Could not create group on the server.
It is recommended to delete the group and try again.
message.jmws.deletion_group_failure: Could not delete group on the server
message.jmws.local_group_upload: Added local group(s) to the server.
message.jmws.local_both_upload: Added local waypoint(s) and group(s) to the server.
text.config.jmws-config.title: JourneyMap Waypoint Syncing (JMWS)
text.config.jmws-config.option.showAlert: Whether waypoint creation, deletion or other alerts are shown.
text.config.jmws-config.option.updateWay: Frequency of when waypoints are grabbed from the server (in ticks)
text.config.jmws-config.option.serverHan: How long until the mod determines that the server doesnt have the mod.
